Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the a:
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the report anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers.

Chat with us anonymously using the Ricoc: Chat with us anonymously using the Ricochet application
To chat with us use the following Ricoch: To chat with us use the following Ricochet address:
By using the Tor network and creating an: By using the Tor network and creating an Onion Service, Ricochet is an instant messaging app that allows you to chat while protecting your privacy and staying anonymous by not revealing your location or IP address. You won't notice any difference from an insecure chat, except that you will be using a unique address instead of a phone number/email/username.

The number of activities recently detect: The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.
The activities with unusual stats are:: The activities with unusual stats are:
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: The server cannot guarantee that a new report can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.
Please consider asking your technical su: Please consider asking your technical support to create more disk space on the server.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: GlobaLeaks technology includes a server status checking component which will alert you in case something requires your attention.
For more information, log in to the Admi: For more information, log in to the Administration interface and look at the "System Stats" and "Anomalies" sections.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:

This is a test email sent out from the p: Testno elektronsko sporočilo iz administrativnega vmesnika platforme.
Reception of this email indicates that t: Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.
This is an email to notify you of a new: To elektronsko sporočilo vas obvešča o novem komentarju na obstoječem prispevku.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.
Click the following link to validate thi: Click the following link to validate this change:
If you didn't request this change, chang: If you didn't request this change, change your password and contact your system administrator.

Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Without a valid certificate, the platform will be accessible in a secure way only via Tor.
Log in to solve the issue.
The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal: The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal scheduled for today just failed.

This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower for the report {TipNum} has provided their identity.
This is an email to notify you of a new: This is an email to notify you of a new message on an existing report.
You're receiving this email because a pa: You're receiving this email because a password reset has been requested for the account: {Username}
If you didn't make this request, you may: If you didn't make this request, you may safely ignore and delete this email.
You can confirm your request by clicking: You can confirm your request by clicking the following link:
This is an email to inform you that your: To sporočilo vas obvešča, da PGP ključ poteče ali, da je že potekel.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
Click the link to activate the platform:: Click the link to activate the platform:
It is good security practice to keep the: It is good security practice to keep the platform up to date.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: To learn about new features and bug fixes in the new version consult the change log at: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: For instructions on software updates, please refer to the documentation at: {UpdateGuideUrl}
Please remember to check them before the: Please remember to check them before they are deleted.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.
